title: Reasonable Doubt: Full Series
description: The complete New York Times Bestselling serial, now available in one book!  My cock has an appetite.  A huge and very particular appetite: Blonde, curvy, and preferably not a fucking liar...(Although, that's a story for another day.) As a high profile lawyer, I don't have time to waste on relationships, so I fulfill my needs by anonymously chatting and sleeping with women I meet online.  My rules are simple: One dinner. One night. No repeats.  This is only casual sex. Nothing more. Nothing less.  At least it was, until "Alyssa"...She was supposed to be a 27 year old lawyer, a book hoarder, and completely unattractive. She was supposed to be someone I shared law advice with late at night, someone I could trust with details of my weekly escapades.  But then she came into my firm for an interview--a college-intern interview, and everything fucking changed...
author: Whitney G.
